description: This file implements a stub scraper class 'RetailerBScraper' for the RetailerB data source within a web scraping framework. It provides methods to return retailer name, base URL, generate product URLs, and fetch product prices in a placeholder manner.

classes.name: RetailerBScraper
classes.description: A stub implementation of the RetailerScraper interface for RetailerB, providing basic retailer name, URL, and price fetching functionalities.

methods.name: retailerName
methods.description: Returns the name of the retailer, 'RetailerB'.

methods.name: baseUrl
methods.description: Returns the base URL for the retailer, configurable via application properties.

methods.name: fetchPriceFor
methods.description: Calculates a placeholder price based on the product ID, returning an Optional<BigDecimal>.

methods.name: productUrl
methods.description: Constructs a product URL using the base URL and product SKU or ID.
